EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners - Ted Buis (1378756452.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Ted, Thanks for sending out this email. Yes, that’s correct. MBO will fulfill all of the paperwork for OCI and we already have per our contract with them. John/Trina – when appropriate, please fill out this statement of work <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf> so we have all the information needed to get Ted set up to bill. Best to all!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Theodore Buis [mailto:tbuis5289@verizon.net] Sent: Monday, September 09, 2013 3:47 PM To: John Cook; Trina Holland Cc: Sara Conde; Silvia Morales Subject: MBO Partners John/Trina, You mentioned MBO Partners and after review of their capabilities, I would like to go through them to work this project. Sara Conde is my point of contact there. As I understand it, I then don’t have to do the W-9 or I-9 with OCI. I expect that I still need to sign all the other documents. Is that correct? Thanks for all your help. Ted Buis240-401-4727 cell
